Serialized Form

  • Package nars.core

    • Class nars.core.Param extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • noiseLevel

          java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger noiseLevel
          Silent threshold for task reporting, in [0, 100]. Noise level = 100 - silence level; noise 0 = always silent, noise 100 = never silent

        • conceptForgettingRate

          java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger conceptForgettingRate
          Concept decay rate in ConceptBag, in [1, 99]. originally: CONCEPT_FORGETTING_CYCLE

        • beliefForgettingRate

          java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger beliefForgettingRate
          TermLink decay rate in TermLinkBag, in [1, 99]. originally: TERM_LINK_FORGETTING_CYCLE

        • taskForgettingRate

          java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger taskForgettingRate
          TaskLink decay rate in TaskLinkBag, in [1, 99]. originally: TASK_LINK_FORGETTING_CYCLE

        • cycleInputTasks

          java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger cycleInputTasks
          How many inputs to process each cycle

        • cycleMemory

          java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger cycleMemory
          How many memory cycles to process each cycle

        • cycleConcepts

          java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger cycleConcepts
          How many concepts to fire each cycle
